reviews: Package arrived a little crushed, but item was intact. Decent remote control car, but disappointed that volume can not be controlled. The music is loud and very repetitive
Purchased for eldest son who works outdoors. Hat keeps his head warm and fit well. He likes that it's not too thick and is breathable

I purchased these gloves for my 24 yr old son who works outdoors. He says the snow doesn't stick to them and they stay dry. He stated that the grip was quite sticky, which was both a positive and negative depending on the use
